casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James A. COX 94P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 22, 2019 Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Cox, James A. James D. Concepcion, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of March 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of March 2019."
